titles.title: MPACT Act
Making Pipelines Accountable to Consumers and Taxpayers Act
MPACT Act
A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to protect consumers from excessive rates, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Making Pipelines Accountable to Consumers and Taxpayers Act or the MPACT Act
This bill gives the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) the authority to order natural gas companies to pay refunds with interest to their consumers for rates or charges that are unjust, unreasonable, unduly discriminatory, or preferential. FERC must also establish refund effective dates as specified by the bill.
